00065 class ReferencedStateSet : virtual public osg::StateSet
00066 {
00067 
00068 public:
00069 
00070     ReferencedStateSet(SceneManager *sceneManager, const char *initID);
00071     ~ReferencedStateSet();
00072 
00078     virtual void updateCallback();
00079 
00083     std::string getID() const { return std::string(id_->s_name); }
00084     t_symbol* getIDSymbol() { return id_; }
00085     std::string getClassType() const { return classType_; }
00086 
00090     //virtual const char *getPath() const = 0;
00091         
00096     void removeFromScene();
00097 
00103     void replace(osg::StateSet *ss);
00104     
00109     virtual void debug();
00110     
00115     virtual std::vector<lo_message> getState() const;
00116 
00120     virtual void stateDump();
00121 
00126     virtual void stateDump(lo_address txAddr);
00127 
00128         // --------------------------------
00129 
00135     virtual void setTextureBlend(int mode);
00136         int getTextureBlend() const;
00137         
00142     virtual void setTextureRepeat(int s, int t);
00143         
00147     virtual void setLighting(int i);
00148 
00152     virtual int getLighting() const { return (int)lightingEnabled_; }
00153 
00158     virtual void setTransparent(int i);
00159 
00164     virtual int getTransparent() const { return (int)transparent_; }
00165 
00170     virtual void setRenderBin (int i);
00171 
00176     virtual int getRenderBin() const { return renderBin_; }
00177 
00178

00195 typedef std::vector< osg::ref_ptr<ReferencedStateSet> > stateListType;
00196 
00197 class ReferencedStateSet_callback : public osg::StateSet::StateSet::Callback
00198 {
00199     public:
00200         
00201         virtual void operator()(osg::StateSet* ss, osg::NodeVisitor* /*nv*/)
00202         {
00203             osg::ref_ptr<ReferencedStateSet> thisState = dynamic_cast<ReferencedStateSet*> (ss->getUserData());
00204 
00205             if (thisState.valid())
00206             {
00207                 thisState->updateCallback();
00208             }
00209         }
00210 };
